name: Shopydo
body:
### Shopydo
Shopydo is an open source e-commerce web application. It was developed by Jérémie Robert with help from the programmers within the open source community.

Shopydo was built using the Phalcon Framework

### Download

[Shopydo Beta](https://github.com/Shopydo/shopydo/archive/master.zip)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Shopydo? Contact contact@shopydo.com and we’ll help you sort it out.
